about_the_game:
No wind? Stuck at work? No one at the beach? No worries, fellow Kitesurfers!
Indulge your passion for Kiteboarding as you work your way to the top in career mode, or ride the wind at your own pace in freeride mode, honing your skills and enjoying three awesome locations as you go.

Is This Game For You?

The game has been designed with realistic kite and board controls that mimic the wind window experience. This can be challenging at first, but once mastered during training mode, the skies the limit.

If you have a passion for Kitesurfing and want to be able to ride the wind without limit, challenge yourself with kite loops and board offs, and maybe even jump a pier, then this game is for you.

This game is best experienced with a gamepad, but Keyboard is supported.

Game Features

  • Training Mode sets you up for the game, teaching you to control the kite, work with the wind window and edge the board.
  • Relax with Freeride mode, riding the wind at your own pace whenever the urge strikes.
  • Progress from basic training to Top Kiteboarder in Career mode, unlocking achievements and mastering challenging tricks as you go.
  • Career contains the following types of levels:
  • Challenge yourself to boost as high as you can go in ‘Big Air’
  • Pull off the most tricks in High score.
  • Zoom through each checkpoint in 'Checkpoint' as fast as you can, however you can.
  • Grab all the letters scattered around your favourite locations in ‘K.I.T.E’.



A choice of four locations - Lagoon, The Coast, Paradise Islands and Ice World. Each location offers a unique seascape, and includes a variety of special features such as NPC Kitesurfers, dolphins, wind farms and, if you are up to the challenge, a pier to jump at The Coast.
See what else you can find.. and jump!

Note From the Developer

I’m a solo developer who loves computer games and kitesurfing and wanted to combine my passions. Winds Up Kitesurfing is the result. It’s been my passion project, and I’ve really tried to create an authentic experience with some of the things I’ve always dreamt of achieving thrown in. I hope you enjoy this game, and thank you to all who download it.

name: Winds Up Kitesurfing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are an estimation, the game might not run as intended on old hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are an estimation, the game might not run as intended on old hardware.

short_description: Winds Up Kitesurfing is an arcade-style simulation game for anyone who loves kiteboarding. It lets you live out all your kitesurfing dreams right from your own device.
